mapper.insert: insert into board_table(boardName, boardTitle, boardOccupation, boardDemploymentType, boardPersonnel, boardWorkperiod, boardWorkDays, boardWorktime, boardGender, boardAge, boardEducation, boardDeadline, boardContext, boardAddress, boardAddress1, boardMoney, boardManagerName, boardEmail, boardMobile,boardDate) values (#{boardName},#{boardTitle},#{boardOccupation},#{boardDemploymentType}, #{boardPersonnel},#{boardWorkperiod},#{boardWorkDays},#{boardWorktime}, #{boardGender},#{boardAge},#{boardEducation},#{boardDeadline}, #{boardContext}, #{boardAddress},#{boardAddress1},#{boardMoney},#{boardManagerName},#{boardEmail}, #{boardMobile},now())
mapper.select: select * from board_table where boardGender=#{boardGender} and boardOccupation=#{boardOccupation}
select * from board_table where boardTitle or boardOccupation or boardDemploymentType or boardWorkperiod or boardWorkDays or boardContext like concat ('%', #{q}, '%')
